Just two days after the passage of Utahâ€™s womenâ€™s suffrage bill, Salt Lake City held a municipal election that provided Utahâ€™s newly-enfranchised women an immediate opportunity to exercise their right to vote, making them the first women to vote since the suffrage movement began.

Join my Clean Air Challenge:
-I will consolidate vehicle trips & reduce my family's total driving
-I will park and walk instead of using drive-up windows
-I will not let my vehicle idle for more than 30 secs, even in the cold
-I will ride my bike, car-pool, or use public transit

Unleashing the power of 5G technology will have lasting, positive impacts on the energy, healthcare, public safety, and transportation sectorsâ€”to only name a few. In a nutshell, 5G creates better efficiency, reduction in failures, improved performance, and new functionality.
We have to remember to keep #5G nonpartisan. Right when it becomes owned by a party, it loses.

My district includes a wide spectrum of Silicon Slopes and rural areas. Last Congress I introduced the AIRWAVES Act, which encourages rural wireless deploymentâ€”critical for rural parts of America like my Congressional District in Southeast Utah.

5G means jobs. 5G deployment is projected to create nearly 1,100 jobs, $180 million in new GDP, $96 million in new network investment, and about $70 million in Smart City benefitsâ€”and that is just in the City of Provo alone.
